abysscraft.disconnect.anticheatverifyfai: Anti-cheating verification failed, please make sure you have installed ClientGuard

Please make sure to connect to the AbyssCraft server and update the AbyssCraftClient mod.

abysscraft.inGameHud.OutOfBorder: This place is full of terrible curses, return to a safe place immediately

abysscraft.region.great_fault.name: Great Fault

abysscraft.region.orth.location.golden_b: Monster Drops for Currency, Exchanging old currency for new currency
abysscraft.region.orth.location.central_: Architectural Blocks, Decorative Blocks, Agricultural, Marine Blocks and Discs

gui.abysscraft.guild.all_desc: Here you can view all guilds, and join guilds
gui.abysscraft.guild.pending_guild: This guild is a pending guild, upon acceptance you will become a co-owner
gui.abysscraft.guild.non_join: You haven't joined any Guild yet
gui.abysscraft.guild.leave_tooltip: If there is no other owner of the guild after leaving, the guild will be dissolved.
gui.abysscraft.guild.create.name: The name of the Guild to be created
gui.abysscraft.guild.create.select_co_ow: Guilds must have two co-owners, choose one of the following online players:
gui.abysscraft.guild.create.selected_co_: %s invites you as a co-owner of guild %s, please use the guild panel to process the request
gui.abysscraft.guild.create.success_wait: The guild is created once co-owners accepts it.
gui.abysscraft.check_you_input: Check if your input is correct
gui.abysscraft.guild.msg.co_owner_alread: This player refuses to join a guild or has already joined a guild
gui.abysscraft.guild.msg.name_repeat: The guild name has been taken
gui.abysscraft.msg.player_not_found: Another player is offline or does not exist
block.abysscraft.bonfire.tooltip_1: Right-click to set the birth point on the abyss, but be careful of being destroyed by various accidents
item.abysscraft.chimokami_fang.tooltip_1: It is said that these beasts house a spiritual fire within.
item.abysscraft.chimokami_fang.tooltip_2: This has been proven to be a hoax, however, their teeth are excellent firestarters.
item.abysscraft.chimokami_tail.tooltip_1: tuft of fur from the tail, These foxlike beasts, their dens in the darker areas
item.abysscraft.corpseweeper_eye.tooltip: It feels like it's staring into your soul...
item.abysscraft.corpseweeper_meat.toolti: It both smells and tastes horrible... Will cooking this help?
item.abysscraft.corpseweeper_meat_cooked: This stench is awful but it tastes so good...
item.abysscraft.inbyo_fur.tooltip_1: Aquired by skinning, This stench is nauseating...
item.abysscraft.inbyo_meat.tooltip_1: Can be cooking, Doesn't look very tasty...
item.abysscraft.inbyo_meat_cooked.toolti: Seems more edible now, though is still smells horrid...
item.abysscraft.ottobas_meat.tooltip_1: Aquired by cutting up huge corpses A thick layer of fat clings to the meat. can be Cooking.
item.abysscraft.ottobas_meat_cooked.tool: flesh is now edible.This should be enough food to last for daaaaayyss!!
item.abysscraft.rohana_powder.tooltip_1: Fine powder, They glow faintly and can be an impromptu light source.
item.abysscraft.rohana_tail.tooltip_1: rarely, They glow faintly and can be used to make brewing stands or other useful relics...
item.abysscraft.cyatoria_drumstick.toolt: Said to be the offspring of a rare creature originating from the 7th Layer, The Final Maelstrom.
I assure you, it tastes just like chicken…
item.abysscraft.cyatoria_feather.tooltip: It resembles the feathers of a %s
item.abysscraft.fuwagi_foot.tooltip_2: Rumor has it if you have a %s in your inventory, you will have good luck.
item.abysscraft.fuwagi_hide.tooltip_2: Soft and cozy. You can make some quality sweaters out of this.
item.abysscraft.fuwagi_meat.tooltip_2: Gamey with a hint of carrot and apple. Mostly carrot though. A Lot of carrots.
item.abysscraft.hammerbeak_beak.tooltip_: Can be used as a fire starter, when combined with a little steel.
It seems sharp enough, to put an eye out.
item.abysscraft.hammerbeak_egg.tooltip_1: an be used as a cooking ingredient or mischievious acts of tomfoolery.
item.abysscraft.hammerbeak_egg.tooltip_2: Mother Hammerbeak does not look to happy…
item.abysscraft.hammerbeak_wing.tooltip_: This meat seems delicious, if cooked properly!
item.abysscraft.okibo_leather.tooltip_2: Looks like it will keep me warm, through the entire winter if needed.
item.abysscraft.okibo_meat.tooltip_1: Usually found in %s as a source of transportation of goods
item.abysscraft.okibo_meat.tooltip_2: are also a great source of food, due to their large size.
item.abysscraft.okibo_meat_cooked.toolti: There is a ritual in %s ,for whenever a §8Black Whistle§r or §7White Whistle§r return from their plunge into the Abyss.
The §6GuildHQ Head Chef§r butchers the %s they arrive on and prepare a giant feast for all.
item.abysscraft.silkfang_eye.tooltip_1: Rumor has it that a larger arachnid can stare back at you through this…
item.abysscraft.silkfang_silk.tooltip_1: Somewhat fine silk with a large amount of tensile strength.
item.abysscraft.silkfang_silk_bundle.too: %ss about to make nests often drop more silk than usual.
A large bundle of webbing like this has a lot of potential for traps.
item.abysscraft.splitjaw_scales.tooltip_: Can be used to make certain blocks.
item.abysscraft.star_compass.tooltip_1: Points towards the center of the §aAbyss§r
item.abysscraft.depth_gauge.tooltip_1: Right-clicking is used by explorers to track their depth
item.abysscraft.depth_gauge.tooltip_2: Normal barometers cannot be used in the Abyss because of the Force Field
item.abysscraft.backpack.tooltip_1: You can use this like bundle, different items will consume different amounts of capacity
